Module dunbar.c482pa
Package dunbar.c482pa.Controllers

Class ModifyProductWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c482pa.Controllers.ModifyProductWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The ModifyProductWindowController controls the interface used to modify existing products. It includes methods for editing the Parts associated with the Product, and updating the Product's fields. The Initializable interface is implemented to populate a table of parts that can be associated with the product.

    • loadProduct

      public void loadProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      Loads the current values for ID, Name, Stock, Price, Min, and Max for the selected product, and populates the associated parts table.

    • onActionAddPart

      void onActionAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Associates a Part with the Product when the Add part button is pressed. Adds the selected Part object to the Product's associatedParts observable list when the Add button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Add button

    • onActionRemovePart

      void onActionRemovePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Disassociates a Part from the Product when the Remove Associated Part button is pressed. Removes the selected part from the Product's associatedParts observable list when the Remove Associated Parts button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Remove Associated Parts button

    • onActionSearch

      void onActionSearch(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Implements search and filtering functionality for the part table. Every time a key is pressed in the part search text box, runs the appropriate Inventory lookupPart() method based on the type of input (integer vs string) then filters the part table contents accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by typing in the part search text box

    • onActionReturnToMain

      void onActionReturnToMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns to the Main window when the cancel button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSaveAndReturn

      void onActionSaveAndReturn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Updates the product and returns to the main window when the Save button is pressed. Generates a new Product object based off of the values in the text fields and passes them to the relevant constructor, then overwrites the existing product in the Inventory allProducts list using the index value. RUNTIME ERROR: Observed that, when saving a modified product, it would always overwrite the first product in the AllProducts list. Reviewed the code and found that index was being initialized to zero, and I had forgotten to set it to the correct value in the loadProduct() method. Fixed by adding line 110 above.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Save button
